Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 93-877.

actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs discharged in House.
Measure passed House, amended, in lieu of H.R. 11890.

official_title: An Act to authorize the conveyance of certain lands to the United States in trust for the citizen band of Pottawatomie Indians.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that the duly elected officials of the Citizens Band of Potawatomi Indians of Oklahoma are authorized to convey to the United States in trust for the Citizens Band of Potawatomi Indians of Oklahoma specified lands and the improvements thereon, subject to all valid existing rights. Describes the seven numbered tracts so conveyed.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the conveyance of certain lands to the United States in trust for the citizen band of Potawatomi Indians of Oklahoma.
An Act to authorize the conveyance of certain lands to the United States in trust for the citizen band of Pottawatomie Indians.
